question: .so my doctors office called me a week later to tell me that failed my glucose test...I'm so bumed :/....so much for no news is good news....I really thought everything was fine now I have to go in tomorrow to do the 3hour test...I'm in tears because I just don't want to fail it...I've never had a problem with diabetes...because I also get screened for it....ugh this *****
title: ugh.!!
